channel.title: Connecting to 508 server
channel.description: Ok!!! got the client to work but how do i connect to a server. and if you use you're own server can it be the one you used for silab and those clients or do i need to make my own special server for this client. If you could give me a blank source for a server i can edit\A source thats already made that i can edit Please give me the link to it. Plus when that server thing is all finished how do i connect? Anyone please answer me
